title: EYL #94 My God VS My Enemies
itunes:title: EYL #94 My God VS My Enemies
description:
Ladun Thompson is the CEO & designer of the Body of God clothing line, which produces the wildly popular “My God vs My Enemies” apparel. Many celebrities and influencers have championed the brand included Ladun’s business partner DJ Envy. In episode 94, Ladun broke down the apparel business and outlined his journey from being down to his last dime to now moving over 2,500 items a month independently. He also spoke about how he is able to use his brand to celebrate his religious faith. In EYL 94, we covered the trademarking process, manufacturing, distribution, idea creation, and being a religious entrepreneur. #branding #Merchandisebusiness #mygodvsmyenemies EYL University: https://www.eyluniversity.com EYL University 40% off Annual Tuition Code: Summer Guest IG: @iamladun --- This episode is sponsored by · Anchor: The easiest way to make a podcast. https://anchor.fm/app Support this podcast: https://anchor.fm/earnyourleisure/support

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
